name: Sabong Saga
description: Sabong Saga is a blockchain game that merges the excitement of traditional cockfighting with the innovation of Web3. Built on the Ronin Network and backed by the Ronin ecosystem, Sabong Saga lets players collect, breed, battle, and trade digital roosters.

websites.description: Collect, breed, and dominate in Sabong Saga, a competitive Web3 cockfighting game. Train your roosters, rise through the ranks, and shape your legacy in the cockpit arena!
dApp where you can craft, rub, breed, and battle your chickens.

contracts.label: Sabong Saga Genesis

contracts.description: A custom contract for crafting items in Sabong Saga.

contracts.label: Sabong Saga Breeding
contracts.description: A custom contract for breeding chickens.

contracts.label: Sabong Saga Daily Feed
contracts.description: A custom contract for feeding chickens to boost chicken stats for period of time.
